projectSummary: A web app that isolates piano from audio files and converts it to readable sheet music

features.name: File Upload
features.summary: Upload audio files and create processing jobs

features.name: Job Progress & Status
features.summary: Real-time job status tracking with pipeline visualization

features.name: Piano Isolation
features.summary: Extract piano audio from mixed tracks using fal.ai SAM Audio

features.name: Audio to MIDI Transcription
features.summary: Convert isolated piano audio to MIDI using Spotify Basic Pitch

features.name: MIDI to Sheet Music
features.summary: Convert MIDI to readable MusicXML and PDF with readability processing

features.name: Sheet Music Viewer
features.summary: Interactive in-app display of generated sheet music

features.name: Export & Download
features.summary: Download generated artifacts in PDF, MusicXML, and MIDI formats

features.name: Audio Playback
features.summary: Play original and isolated piano audio for comparison

features.name: Readability Controls
features.summary: User-adjustable settings for sheet music quality and regeneration
